00046 #ifndef _RTAI_NUCLEUS_QUEUE_H
00047 #define _RTAI_NUCLEUS_QUEUE_H
00048 
00049 #include <nucleus/types.h>
00050 
00051 /* Basic element holder */
00052 
00053 typedef struct xnholder {
00054 
00055     struct xnholder *next;
00056     struct xnholder *last;
00057 
00058 } xnholder_t;
00059 
00060 static inline void inith (xnholder_t *holder) {
00061     /* Holding queues are doubly-linked and circular */
00062     holder->last = holder;
00063     holder->next = holder;
00064 }
00065 
00066 static inline void ath (xnholder_t *head,
00067                         xnholder_t *holder) {
00068     /* Inserts the new element right after the heading one  */
00069     holder->last = head;
00070     holder->next = head->next;
00071     holder->next->last = holder;
00072     head->next = holder;
00073 }
00074 
00075 static inline void dth (xnholder_t *holder) {
00076     holder->last->next = holder->next;
00077     holder->next->last = holder->last;
00078 }
00079 
00080 /* Basic element queue */
00081 
00082 typedef struct xnqueue {
00083 
00084     xnholder_t head;
00085     int elems;
00086 #if defined(CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG) && defined(CONFIG_SMP)
00087     xnlock_t lock;
00088 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG && CONFIG_SMP */
00089 
00090 } xnqueue_t;
00091 
00092 #if defined(CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG) && defined(CONFIG_SMP)
00093 #define DECLARE_XNQUEUE(q) xnqueue_t q = { { &(q).head, &(q).head }, 0, XNARCH_LOCK_UNLOCKED }
00094 #else /* !(CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG && CONFIG_SMP) */
00095 #define DECLARE_XNQUEUE(q) xnqueue_t q = { { &(q).head, &(q).head }, 0 }
00096 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG && CONFIG_SMP */
00097 
00098 static inline void initq (xnqueue_t *qslot) {
00099     inith(&qslot->head);
00100     qslot->elems = 0;
00101 #if defined(CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG) && defined(CONFIG_SMP)
00102     xnlock_init(&qslot->lock);
00103 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG && CONFIG_SMP */
00104 }
00105 
00106 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG
00107 
00108 #define XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE() \
00109 do { \
00110     xnholder_t *curr; \
00111     spl_t s; \
00112     int nelems = 0; \
00113     xnlock_get_irqsave(&qslot->lock,s); \
00114     curr = qslot->head.last; \
00115     while (curr != &qslot->head && nelems < qslot->elems) \
00116         curr = curr->last, nelems++; \
00117     if (curr != &qslot->head || nelems != qslot->elems) \
00118         xnpod_fatal("corrupted queue, qslot->elems=%d, qslot=%p", \
00119                     qslot->elems, \
00120                     qslot); \
00121     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&qslot->lock,s); \
00122 } while(0)
00123 
00124 #define XENO_DEBUG_INSERT_QUEUE() \
00125 do { \
00126     xnholder_t *curr; \
00127     spl_t s; \
00128     xnlock_get_irqsave(&qslot->lock,s); \
00129     curr = qslot->head.last; \
00130     while (curr != &qslot->head && holder != curr) \
00131         curr = curr->last; \
00132     if (curr == holder) \
00133         xnpod_fatal("inserting element twice, holder=%p, qslot=%p", \
00134                     holder, \
00135                     qslot); \
00136     if (holder->last == NULL)   /* Just a guess. */ \
00137         xnpod_fatal("holder=%p not initialized, qslot=%p", \
00138                     holder, \
00139                     qslot); \
00140     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&qslot->lock,s); \
00141 } while(0)
00142 
00143 #define XENO_DEBUG_REMOVE_QUEUE() \
00144 do { \
00145     xnholder_t *curr; \
00146     spl_t s; \
00147     xnlock_get_irqsave(&qslot->lock,s); \
00148     curr = qslot->head.last; \
00149     while (curr != &qslot->head && holder != curr) \
00150         curr = curr->last; \
00151     if (curr == &qslot->head) \
00152         xnpod_fatal("removing non-linked element, holder=%p, qslot=%p", \
00153                     holder, \
00154                     qslot); \
00155     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&qslot->lock,s); \
00156 } while(0)
00157 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG */
00158 
00159 static inline int insertq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00160                            xnholder_t *head,
00161                            xnholder_t *holder) {
00162     /* Insert the <holder> element before <head> */
00163 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG
00164     XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE();
00165     XENO_DEBUG_INSERT_QUEUE();
00166 #endif /*CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG */
00167     ath(head->last,holder);
00168     return ++qslot->elems;
00169 }
00170 
00171 static inline int prependq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00172                             xnholder_t *holder) {
00173     /* Prepend the element to the queue */
00174 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG
00175     XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE();
00176     XENO_DEBUG_INSERT_QUEUE();
00177 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG */
00178     ath(&qslot->head,holder);
00179     return ++qslot->elems;
00180 }
00181 
00182 static inline int appendq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00183                            xnholder_t *holder) {
00184     /* Append the element to the queue */
00185 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG
00186     XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE();
00187     XENO_DEBUG_INSERT_QUEUE();
00188 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG */
00189     ath(qslot->head.last,holder);
00190     return ++qslot->elems;
00191 }
00192 
00193 static inline int removeq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00194                            xnholder_t *holder) {
00195 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG
00196     XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE();
00197     XENO_DEBUG_REMOVE_QUEUE();
00198 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG */
00199     dth(holder);
00200     return --qslot->elems;
00201 }
00202 
00203 static inline xnholder_t *getheadq (xnqueue_t *qslot) {
00204     xnholder_t *holder = qslot->head.next;
00205     if (holder == &qslot->head) return NULL;
00206     return holder;
00207 }
00208 
00209 static inline xnholder_t *getq (xnqueue_t *qslot) {
00210     xnholder_t *holder = getheadq(qslot);
00211     if (holder) removeq(qslot,holder);
00212     return holder;
00213 }
00214 
00215 static inline xnholder_t *nextq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00216                                  xnholder_t *holder) {
00217     xnholder_t *nextholder = holder->next;
00218     return nextholder == &qslot->head ? NULL : nextholder;
00219 }
00220 
00221 static inline xnholder_t *popq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00222                                 xnholder_t *holder) {
00223     xnholder_t *nextholder = nextq(qslot,holder);
00224     removeq(qslot,holder);
00225     return nextholder;
00226 }
00227 
00228 static inline int countq (xnqueue_t *qslot) {
00229     return qslot->elems;
00230 }
00231 
00232 static inline int moveq (xnqueue_t *dstq, xnqueue_t *srcq) {
00233     
00234     xnholder_t *headsrc = srcq->head.next;
00235     xnholder_t *tailsrc = srcq->head.last->last;
00236     xnholder_t *headdst = &dstq->head;
00237 
00238     headsrc->last->next = tailsrc->next;
00239     tailsrc->next->last = headsrc->last;
00240     headsrc->last = headdst;
00241     tailsrc->next = headdst->next;
00242     headdst->next->last = tailsrc;
00243     headdst->next = headsrc;
00244     dstq->elems += srcq->elems;
00245     srcq->elems = 0;
00246 
00247     return dstq->elems;
00248 }
00249 
00250 /* Prioritized element holder */
00251 
00252 typedef struct xnpholder {
00253 
00254     xnholder_t plink;
00255     int prio;
00256 
00257 } xnpholder_t;
00258 
00259 static inline void initph (xnpholder_t *holder) {
00260     inith(&holder->plink);
00261     /* Priority is set upon queue insertion */
00262 }
00263 
00264 /* Prioritized element queue */
00265 
00266 #define xnqueue_up   (-1)
00267 #define xnqueue_down   1
00268 
00269 typedef struct xnpqueue {
00270 
00271     xnqueue_t pqueue;
00272     int qdir;
00273 
00274 } xnpqueue_t;
00275 
00276 static inline void initpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00277                            int qdir) {
00278     initq(&pqslot->pqueue);
00279     pqslot->qdir = qdir;
00280 }
00281 
00282 static inline int insertpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00283                             xnpholder_t *head,
00284                             xnpholder_t *holder) {
00285     /* Insert the <holder> element before <head> */
00286     return insertq(&pqslot->pqueue,&head->plink,&holder->plink);
00287 }
00288 
00289 static inline int insertpqf (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00290                              xnpholder_t *holder,
00291                              int prio) {
00292 
00293     /* Insert the element at the end of its priority group (FIFO) */
00294 
00295     xnholder_t *curr;
00296 
00297     if (pqslot->qdir == xnqueue_down) {
00298         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.last;
00299              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->last) {
00300                 if (prio <= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00301                     break;
00302         }
00303     }
00304     else {
00305         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.last;
00306              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->last) {
00307                 if (prio >= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00308                     break;
00309         }
00310     }
00311 
00312     holder->prio = prio;
00313 
00314     return insertq(&pqslot->pqueue,curr->next,&holder->plink);
00315 }
00316 
00317 static inline int insertpql (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00318                              xnpholder_t *holder,
00319                              int prio) {
00320 
00321     /* Insert the element at the front of its priority group (LIFO) */
00322 
00323     xnholder_t *curr;
00324 
00325     if (pqslot->qdir == xnqueue_down) {
00326         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.next;
00327              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->next) {
00328                 if (prio >= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00329                     break;
00330         }
00331     }
00332     else {
00333         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.next;
00334              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->next) {
00335                 if (prio <= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00336                     break;
00337         }
00338     }
00339 
00340     holder->prio = prio;
00341 
00342     return insertq(&pqslot->pqueue,curr,&holder->plink);
00343 }
00344 
00345 static inline xnpholder_t *findpqh (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00346                                     int prio) {
00347 
00348     /* Find the element heading a given priority group */
00349 
00350     xnholder_t *curr;
00351 
00352     if (pqslot->qdir == xnqueue_down) {
00353         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.next;
00354              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->next) {
00355                 if (prio >= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00356                     break;
00357         }
00358     }
00359     else {
00360         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.next;
00361              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->next) {
00362                 if (prio <= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00363                     break;
00364         }
00365     }
00366 
00367     if (curr && ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio == prio)
00368         return (xnpholder_t *)curr;
00369 
00370     return NULL;
00371 }
00372 
00373 static inline int appendpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00374                             xnpholder_t *holder) {
00375     holder->prio = 0;
00376     return appendq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00377 }
00378 
00379 static inline int prependpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00380                              xnpholder_t *holder) {
00381     holder->prio = 0;
00382     return prependq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00383 }
00384 
00385 static inline int removepq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00386                             xnpholder_t *holder) {
00387     return removeq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00388 }
00389 
00390 static inline xnpholder_t *getheadpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot) {
00391     return (xnpholder_t *)getheadq(&pqslot->pqueue);
00392 }
00393 
00394 static inline xnpholder_t *nextpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00395                                    xnpholder_t *holder) {
00396     return (xnpholder_t *)nextq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00397 }
00398 
00399 static inline xnpholder_t *getpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot) {
00400     return (xnpholder_t *)getq(&pqslot->pqueue);
00401 }
00402 
00403 static inline xnpholder_t *poppq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00404                                   xnpholder_t *holder) {
00405     return (xnpholder_t *)popq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00406 }
00407 
00408 static inline int countpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot) {
00409     return countq(&pqslot->pqueue);
00410 }
00411 
00412 /* Generic prioritized element holder */
00413 
00414 typedef struct xngholder {
00415 
00416     xnpholder_t glink;
00417     void *data;
00418 
00419 } xngholder_t;
00420 
00421 static inline void initgh (xngholder_t *holder, void *data) {
00422     inith(&holder->glink.plink);
00423     holder->data = data;
00424 }
00425 
00426 /* Generic element queue */
00427 
00428 typedef struct xngqueue {
00429 
00430     xnpqueue_t gqueue;
00431     xnqueue_t *freehq;
00432     void (*starvation)(xnqueue_t *);
00433     int threshold;
00434 
00435 } xngqueue_t;
00436 
00437 static inline void initgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00438                            xnqueue_t *freehq,
00439                            void (*starvation)(xnqueue_t *),
00440                            int threshold,
00441                            int qdir) {
00442     initpq(&gqslot->gqueue,qdir);
00443     gqslot->freehq = freehq;
00444     gqslot->starvation = starvation;
00445     gqslot->threshold = threshold;
00446 }
00447 
00448 static inline xngholder_t *allocgh (xngqueue_t *gqslot) {
00449 
00450     if (countq(gqslot->freehq) < gqslot->threshold)
00451         gqslot->starvation(gqslot->freehq);
00452 
00453     return (xngholder_t *)getq(gqslot->freehq);
00454 }
00455 
00456 static inline void *removegh (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00457                               xngholder_t *holder) {
00458     removepq(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink);
00459     appendq(gqslot->freehq,&holder->glink.plink);
00460     return holder->data;
00461 }
00462 
00463 static inline int insertgqf (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00464                              void *data,
00465                              int prio) {
00466     xngholder_t *holder = allocgh(gqslot);
00467     holder->data = data;
00468     return insertpqf(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink,prio);
00469 }
00470 
00471 static inline int insertgql (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00472                              void *data,
00473                              int prio) {
00474     xngholder_t *holder = allocgh(gqslot);
00475     holder->data = data;
00476     return insertpql(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink,prio);
00477 }
00478 
00479 static inline int appendgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00480                             void *data) {
00481     xngholder_t *holder = allocgh(gqslot);
00482     holder->data = data;
00483     return appendpq(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink);
00484 }
00485 
00486 static inline int prependgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00487                              void *data) {
00488     xngholder_t *holder = allocgh(gqslot);
00489     holder->data = data;
00490     return prependpq(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink);
00491 }
00492 
00493 static inline xngholder_t *getheadgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot) {
00494     return (xngholder_t *)getheadpq(&gqslot->gqueue);
00495 }
00496 
00497 static inline xngholder_t *nextgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00498                                    xngholder_t *holder) {
00499     return (xngholder_t *)nextpq(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink);
00500 }
00501 
00502 static inline void *getgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot) {
00503     xngholder_t *holder = getheadgq(gqslot);
00504     if (!holder) return NULL;
00505     appendq(gqslot->freehq,&getpq(&gqslot->gqueue)->plink);
00506     return holder->data;
00507 }
00508 
00509 static inline xngholder_t *popgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00510                                   xngholder_t *holder) {
00511     xngholder_t *nextholder = nextgq(gqslot,holder);
00512     removegh(gqslot,holder);
00513     return nextholder;
00514 }
00515 
00516 static inline xngholder_t *findgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00517                                    void *data) {
00518     xnholder_t *holder;
00519 
00520     for (holder = gqslot->gqueue.pqueue.head.next;
00521          holder != &gqslot->gqueue.pqueue.head; holder = holder->next) {
00522          if (((xngholder_t *)holder)->data == data)
00523              return (xngholder_t *)holder;
00524         }
00525 
00526     return NULL;
00527 }
00528 
00529 static inline void *removegq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00530                               void *data) {
00531     xngholder_t *holder = findgq(gqslot,data);
00532     return holder ? removegh(gqslot,holder) : NULL;
00533 }
00534 
00535 static inline int countgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot) {
00536     return countpq(&gqslot->gqueue);
00537 }
00538 
00539 #endif /* !_RTAI_NUCLEUS_QUEUE_H */
